data.name: WhatWillYouNameYourFirm.2
data.value: What will you name your Firm:

data.name: CashOrGuns
data.value: Do you want to start . . . 1) With cash (and a debt) >> or << 2) With five guns and no cash (But no debt!)

data.name: YouGotRobbed
data.value: Bad Joss!! You've been beaten up and robbed of {0} in cash, Taipan!!

data.name: LiYuenHasSentALieutenant
data.value: Li Yuen has sent a Lieutenant, Taipan. He says his admiral wishes to see you in Hong Kong, posthaste!

data.name: LargeTheftFromWarehouse
data.value: Messenger reports large theft from warehouse, Taipan.

data.name: AuthoritiesSeizedYourOpium
data.value: Bad Joss!! The local authorities have seized your Opium cargo and have also fined you {0}, Taipan!

data.name: YouOnlyHaveXInTheBank
data.value: Taipan, you only have {0} in the bank.

data.name: HowMuchToMove
data.value: How much {0} shall I move to the warehouse, Taipan?

data.name: WarehouseWillOnlyHoldX
data.value: Your warehouse will only hold an additional {0}, Taipan!

data.name: HowMuchToMoveAboard
data.value: How much {0} shall I move aboard ship, Taipan?

data.name: WhereToGo
data.value: Taipan, do you wish me to go to: 1) Hong Kong, 2) Shanghai, 3) Nagasaki, 4) Saigon, 5) Manila, 6) Singapore, or 7) Batavia ?

data.name: McHenryHasArrived
data.value: Taipan, Mc Henry from the Hong Kong Shipyards has arrived!! He says, "I see ye've a wee bit of damage to yer ship. Will ye be wanting repairs?

data.name: HowMuchWillYeSpend
data.value: Och, 'tis a pity to be {0}% damaged. We can fix yer whole ship for {0}, or make partial repairs if you wish. How much will ye spend?

data.name: ElderBrotherWuSpiel.1
data.value: Elder Brother Wu has sent {0} braves to escort you to the Wu mansion, Taipan.

data.name: ElderBrotherWuSpiel.2
data.value: Elder Brother Wu reminds you of the Confucian ideal of personal worthiness, and how this applies to paying one's debts.

data.name: ElderBrotherWuSpiel.3
data.value: He is reminded of a fabled barbarian who came to a bad end, after not caring for his obligations. He hopes no such fate awaits you, his friend, Taipan.

data.name: ElderBrotherIsAwareOfYourPlight
data.value: Elder Brother is aware of your plight, Taipan. He is willing to loan you an additional {0} if you will pay back {1}. Are you willing, Taipan?

data.name: HowMuchToRepay
data.value: How much do you wish to repay him?

data.name: HowMuchToBorrow
data.value: How much do you wish to borrow?

data.name: LiYuensFleetDroveThemOff
data.value: Li Yuen's fleet drove them off!

data.name: GoodJossTheyLetUsBe
data.value: Good joss!! They let us be!!

data.name: XShipsOfLiYuensPirateFleet
data.value: {0} ships of Li Yuen's pirate fleet, Taipan!!

data.name: WeCapturedSomeBooty
data.value: We captured some booty. It's worth {0}!

data.name: DoYouWishToBuyAGun
data.value: Do you wish to buy a ship's gun for {0}, Taipan?

data.name: VeryWellGameOver
data.value: Very well, Taipan, the game is over!

data.name: ShallIBuySellVisitBankTransferCargoQuitTradingOrRetire
data.value: Shall I Buy, Sell, Visit bank, Transfer cargo, Quit trading, or Retire?

data.name: ShallIBuySellVisitBankTransferCargoOrQuitTrading
data.value: Shall I Buy, Sell, Visit bank, Transfer cargo, or Quit trading?

data.name: ShallIBuySellOrQuitTrading
data.value: Shall I Buy, Sell, or Quit trading?

data.name: LiYuenAsksXInDonation
data.value: Li Yuen asks {0} in donation to the temple of Tin Hau, the Sea Goddess. Will you pay?

data.name: YouDoNotHaveEnoughCash
data.value: Taipan, you do not have enough cash!!

data.name: DoYouWantElderBrotherWuToMakeUpTheDifference
data.value: Do you want Elder Brother Wu to make up the difference for you?

data.name: ElderBrotherHasGivenLiYuenTheDifference
data.value: Elder Brother has given Li Yuen the difference between what he wanted and your cash on hand and added the same amount to your debt.

data.name: ElderBrotherWuWillNotPayLiYuenTheDifference
data.value: Very well. Elder Brother Wu will not pay Li Yuen the difference. I would be very wary of pirates if I were you, Taipan.

data.name: DoYouHaveBusinessWithElderBrotherWu
data.value: Do you have business with Elder Brother Wu, the moneylender?

data.name: HeWontLoanYouSoMuch
data.value: He won't loan you so much, Taipan!

data.name: BadJossYouHaveBeenRobbed
data.value: Bad joss!! {0} of your bodyguards have been killed by cutthroats and you have been robbed of all of your cash, Taipan!!

data.name: DoYouWishToTradeInYourShip.Damaged
data.value: Do you wish to trade in your damaged ship for one with 50 more capacity by paying an additional {0}, Taipan?

data.name: DoYouWishToTradeInYourShip.Fine
data.value: Do you wish to trade in your fine ship for one with 50 more capacity by paying an additional {0}, Taipan?

data.name: WhatShallWeDo
data.value: Taipan, what shall we do?? (f=fight, r=run, t=throw cargo)

data.name: YouHaveTheFollowingOnBoard
WhatShallIThrowOverboard
data.value: What shall I throw overboard, Taipan?

data.name: TheBuggersHitAGun
data.value: The buggers hit a gun, Taipan!!

data.name: YouOnlyHaveXInCash
data.value: Taipan, you only have {0} in cash.

data.name: TheBuggersGotUs
data.value: The buggers got us, Taipan!!! It's all over, now!!!

data.name: WeveBeenBlownOffCourseTo
data.value: We've been blown off course to {0}

data.name: WhatDoYouWishMeToBuy
data.value: What do you wish me to buy, Taipan?

data.name: HowMuchXShallIBuy
data.value: How much {0} shall I buy, Taipan:
